definition[0]: something that is slippery is difficult to hold, walk on etc because it is wet or greasy
example[0]: In places, the path can be wet and slippery.
example[1]: Harry’s palms were slippery with sweat.
definition[1]: someone who is slippery cannot be trusted
example[2]: Martin is a slippery customer  (=someone you should not trust) so be careful what you say to him.
definition[2]: not having one clear meaning and able to be understood in different ways
